summary: This document is a chain of internal FBI emails from November 2020 regarding a request from Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys to schedule a review of an FBI secure laptop at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC). The emails coordinate agent availability for the proposed visit on Friday, November 6, 2020.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the legal case; her attorneys are requesting access for her to review an FBI secure laptop while she is detained at the MDC.

events.title: Requested FBI Laptop Review at MDC
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys requested a full-day visit (8am-3pm) for Maxwell to review the contents of an FBI secure laptop while she is in custody at the Metropolitan Detention Center.

locations: 800 Third Avenue, New York, NY 10022 (law firm address)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team was actively reviewing evidence, specifically requesting access to an 'FBI secure laptop' in November 2020.
The proposed review was scheduled for a full day (8am to 3pm) on Friday, November 6, 2020, at the Metropolitan Detention Center where Maxwell was held.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination to find available agents to facilitate the defense's evidence review request.
The correspondence originates from the law firm Cohen & Gresser, as indicated by the footer containing their address and confidentiality notice.
